ReferenceDocuments.name: What is the test group identi
ReferenceDocuments.description: What is the test group identifier?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form  Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Indicate whether or not drug accountability was performed.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: General prompt question to be used as a data management tool to verify that missing results are confirmed missing. This may be implemented for all tests collected on the same horizontal record or for each specific test. When mapped to SDTM, the value of DAPERF would apply to all tests on the same record. Use the CDASH variable [DATESTCD]_DAPERF when implemented on a specific test basis. This CDASH variable name is an example of what "variable name" can be used in a denormalized data structure.

ReferenceDocuments.name: DAGRPID
ReferenceDocuments.description: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable.
